title: BRIEF-Aeromexico Reports March 2018 Traffic Results
text:
April 6, 2018 / 1:05 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Aeromexico Reports March 2018 Traffic Results Reuters Staff 
April 6 (Reuters) - Grupo Aeromexico SAB de CV: * AEROMEXICO REPORTS MARCH 2018 TRAFFIC RESULTS 
* ‍AEROMEXICO’S MARCH LOAD FACTOR WAS 80.2%, AN INCREASE OF 0.9 P.P. COMPARED TO MARCH 2017​ 
* ‍REV PASSENGER KILOMETERS IN MARCH, INCREASED BY 15.3%, YOY 
* ‍AVAILABLE SEAT KILOMETERS IN MARCH, INCREASED BY 14.0% YOY 
* ‍GRUPO AEROMEXICO TRANSPORTED 1 MILLION 799 THOUSAND PASSENGERS IN MARCH; A 7.1% YOY INCREASE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
